title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive REPL and CLI helper that wraps ollama with readline history, themes and prompt templates.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chat history, multi-user support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating text/embeddings with local Ollama server.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; supports Kotlin, Scala, Android. Offers sync/async APIs and SSE streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: RAG, function-calling, fine-tune, multimodal, LangGraph, Autogen examples with Ollama.

title: ollama-gpt-cli
summary: Terminal UI (blessed) for multi-model chats, sessions, and markdown rendering against Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks adding Open-WebUI, Postgres, Qdrant, and nginx to Ollama for full RAG.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that sends selected blocks to any Ollama model for summarization, translation or continuation.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async/await, static binaries and tiny runtime.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama's chat, generate and embeddings APIs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes and get results inline or in new pane.
